name: #dontkillyourdate
description:
#DontKillYourDate is a dating-sim game straight out of a classic film noir ... that throws robots at it! Struggle through the programming of a fatal robot while seeking to find love. Detective your way properly and you might not kill your date in front of everyone. Manual not included.

#DontKillYourDate created at DMG's Feb Fatale 3: Killer Interfaces Jam by Bear and Bird games, co-creators Mikki Benaglia and Travis Brandon. Game released in 2015!

Created at DMG's Feb Fatale 3: Killer Interfaces: https://dmg.to/events/feb-fatale-3-killer-interfaces

Exhibitor at DMG's Killer Interfaces! Party + Fundraiser: https://dmg.to/events/killer-interfaces-party

Showcased in the arcade and demoed in a talk by Mikki Benaglia at DMG's Feb Fatale 3 Showcase: https://dmg.to/events/february-speakers-social-feb-fatale-3-showcase

Exhibitor at Bento Miso's (now Gamma Space) Bit Bazaar Spring 2015: http://thebitbazaar.com/spring-2015
